string  message,
int[]  alerts,
bool  notice 
)

Schedule a restart for the scene this module runs in.

Parameters:
initiator The user (or other ID) that caused this restart
message The message to send to the clients in the sim
alerts The times to send alert messages to the clients in the sim
notice Send the alert messages as notices instead of blue box popups
